attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A new UK Passport costs £66 (€100) and £94 (€142) if you live in Spain. In Spain, the cost of a Biometric Passport with an RFID chip costs £11.20 (€16.90) For this reason I wish to petition the Prime Minister to lower the fee for UK passports.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
